title: New Leblanc RR
body: What the secon RR needs is a second activation where leblanc can switch places with the clone.... that would be the deciever

replies.body: I'm not sure. but i feel like swapping places with the clone would be an appropriately deceptive kind of thing
i think that would overload her kit way too much, she already has so much going on with the new ult
mm i don't fully understand it yet, will be nice to get some practise in.
redmercy has a good showcase on youtube about the reworked assassins, his lb gameplay looks insane
He messed up alot on it

Global instantaneous telport?
Sounds like a bit much of extraneous power.
my mistake, not the global R, but the mimic R, the nearby one which mimics abilities
or she can swap places with her global clone aslong as its within teather range of E?
